content.text:
# Cameron Deane Stewart

| birth_place  = California, U.S.
| occupation   = Actor
| years_active = 2010â€“present
}}
Cameron Deane Stewart (born April 8, 1991) is an American actor. He is known for his roles in the films Geography Club, Pitch Perfect, and the television teen sitcom iCarly.
Career
Cameron played the role of Steven in iCarly and Victorious special, "iParty with Victorious" in 2011. In 2013, he has gained more attention from his leading role as Russell, a closeted gay teen who joins his high school football team, in Geography Club.  He went on to star as Tom in Pitch Perfect. He had a recurring role as Jace in the Disney Channel sitcom Austin & Ally as well as several other television series.
